title: From Brexit to Brahms, John Humphrys is transformed
text:
I don’t know about you, but my idea of a relaxing retirement doesn’t include appearing live on national radio at six in the morning. Especially not if that had been my job for 32 years. But that’s exactly what John Humphrys, who “retired” from the Today programme last month, is doing this week. He’s filling in for Classic FM’s More Music Breakfast presenter, Tim Lihoreau, who is on holiday.

More Music Breakfast listeners, however, may not be easily charmed by Humphrys. Lihoreau has a loyal and deserved following. His breakfast show is calm, well-informed, good fun and, usually, simply a lovely place to start the morning. Where Humphrys has a reputation as grumpy and difficult, Lihoreau seems...
description: I don’t know about you, but my idea of a relaxing retirement doesn’t include appearing live on national radio at six in the morning.
